name: list_files
description: Lists files and directories in a specified path. Useful for exploring project structure and finding files.

path.description: The directory path to list. Defaults to current directory if not specified.

recursive.description: Whether to list files recursively in subdirectories (or wants to get all system files list). Default is false.

show_hidden.description: Whether to show hidden files (files starting with '.'). Default is false.

pattern.description: Glob pattern to filter files (e.g., '*.py' for Python files). Optional.
